payload.content: Sergey Brin, co-founder of Google and Alphabet Inc., began his graduate studies in computer science at the Stanford School of Engineering in 1993.

name: Sergey Brin, co-founder of Google and Alphabet Inc., began his graduate studies
content: Sergey Brin, co-founder of Google and Alphabet Inc., began his graduate studies in computer science at the Stanford School of Engineering in 1993.

payload.content: Sergey Brin met Larry Page during his second year of graduate studies at Stanford, and together they developed PageRank, an algorithm later renamed Google.

name: Sergey Brin met Larry Page during his second year of graduate studies at Stanfor
content: Sergey Brin met Larry Page during his second year of graduate studies at Stanford, and together they developed PageRank, an algorithm later renamed Google.

payload.content: What began as a Stanford research project debuted as a company in 1998.

name: What began as a Stanford research project debuted as a company in 1998.
content: What began as a Stanford research project debuted as a company in 1998.

payload.content: Sergey Brin returned to Stanford campus on December 7 for the closing event of Stanford Engineering’s centennial year, engaging in a conversation with Stanford President Jonathan Levin and Dean Jennifer Widom.

name: Sergey Brin returned to Stanford campus on December 7 for the closing event of S
content: Sergey Brin returned to Stanford campus on December 7 for the closing event of Stanford Engineering’s centennial year, engaging in a conversation with Stanford President Jonathan Levin and Dean Jennifer Widom.
